item.title: Master internship: tabular foundation models for epidemic modeling
item.description:
We are looking for an intern to apply foundation models for tabular data to modeling spatially structured epidemics. Candidates will be 1st-year or 2nd-year master students in computer science, machine learning, physics or applied mathematics. The starting date can be from September 2025, onwards. Internships typically last 4 to 6 months. Check out our relevant publication.

If you would like to have more information please contact the PI Eugenio Valdano. To apply for the internship please use this link.
